titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to John Haly
CWG13680

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 11; Bundles of AG & QMG Expenditures 1864-65; Bundle 3

body.p:
NO. 12.
The State of Kentucky,
To John Haly, Dr.
Hospital

row.cell: To One Dozen Brooms 2.50 one load of Saw dust 50¢
" One Brass drawer Lock 60 (19) one coffin Trimmed 10.75
" Six chambers & lids 7.00 (20) one Coffin Trimmed 10.75
" Plank for Covering graves 1.00 Four Benches 12.00
" One coffin Trimmed 10.50 Two pair Drawers & Locks 5.00
" Eight lights of Glass 7.20 Carpenter work on 1st floor 11.89
" Nine lights of sash 2.25 One Tin Bucket 40¢
" Stove pipe. &. repairing 4.10 Two large dish pans 2.50
" One Tin Bucket 30¢ one watering pot 75
" one dusting pan 50¢ Two large sheet Iron pans 2.00

body.p: I certify that the above account is correct and just, and that the articles were furnished as stated, and were necessary for the public service.

Wm H Gardner
Surgeon in Charge Hospital
Quarter-Master Gen. of Ky.

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 14th of April, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter=Master General for the State of Kentucky, the sum of One hundred and Eighteen dolars and forty nine cents, in full of the above account.
(DUPLICATE.)

190
No 12.
No 64 Abstract. G
Jno Haley
Dollars 118 49/100
Paid April 14 1864.
